DOC.brief_summary: To investigate safety and tolerability of BI 655064 in healthy male volunteers following intravenous infusion of escalating single doses and following subcutaneous injection. Exploration of the pharmacokinetics and pharmacodynamics of BI 655064 after single dosing and determination of the bioavailability of subcutaneous injections of BI 655064.
DOC.brief_title: Single Rising Dose Study (Intravenous Infusion and Subcutaneous Injection) of BI 655064 in Healthy Male Volunteers
DOC.criteria: Inclusion criteria: 1. Healthy male subjects Exclusion criteria: 1. Any relevant deviation from healthy conditions
